Generated your animation, any follow up edits?
add last page icon outro with the app "iObserver, we track everything"
Added an outro page that transitions in near the end, displaying the provided app icon and the text “iObserver, we track everything” over the same background with a subtle scale/opacity spring.

edits.description: Import Img from remotion to render the provided SVG icon URL
edits.old_string: import { AbsoluteFill, interpolate, spring, useCurrentFrame, useVideoConfig } from "remotion";

edits.description: Add outro timing constants and outro copy
Compute outro start frame based on video duration (end card)
edits.old_string: const chartWidth = width - PADDING_X * 2 - AXIS_LABEL_COL_WIDTH - CHART_GAP;

edits.description: Wrap existing header+chart content in a container that fades out as outro fades in
Close the fade-out wrapper and add the final outro page overlay with icon + app text
Append outro overlay just before closing AbsoluteFill and close the fade-out wrapper div
edits.new_string:
{/* Outro page */}
{OUTRO_TEXT}
{OUTRO_TAGLINE}
);
